clause_text: This Lease Agreement is made and executed by and between Juan Dela Cruz and Maria Santos.
The term of this lease shall be twelve (12) months commencing on March 1, 2025 and ending on March 1, 2026.
The Lessee agrees to pay a monthly rental fee of PHP 10,000.
Both parties agree to maintain the premises in good condition.
Either party may terminate this agreement upon thirty (30) days written notice.
